text:
Jefferson is a town in Ashe County, North Carolina, United States. In 2010, 1,611 people lived there. It is the county seat of Ashe County.
Geography.
The United States Census Bureau says that the town has a total area of. Of that, or 0.20%, is water. The New River, which is part of the Ohio River. It is one of the oldest in the eastern United States, and it goes through the town.
